narrative.narrative: Shandong Airlines makes its base at Jinan,Shandong,China. It is owned by Air China and also holds a 10% stake in Sichuan Airlines. Other focus cities include Beijing, Qingdao and Yantai. They fly mainly domestic routes but also fly to Japan,South Korea and Taiwan and have more than 60 destinations. Their fleet of 75 planes are mostly 737s and a few CRJ's.
